# VinMemory

A public, AI-friendly reference library for curated prompts, guides, and cheatsheets.  
Designed to work with [GitMCP](https://gitmcp.io) so AI tools can connect directly.

## Key Sections
- [Prompts](prompts/README.md) — Prompt templates and patterns.
- [Guides](guides/README.md) — Step-by-step workflows and tool instructions.
- [Cheatsheets](cheatsheets/README.md) — Quick reference for commands and syntax.

## GitMCP Connection
MCP SSE URL: https://gitmcp.io/vdeaugustine/VinMemory

---
Last updated: 2025-08-10
